scripts.browserify: yarn pegjs && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js satriani.js --standalone Satriani -o satriani.standalone.js
scripts.deploy: node_modules/gh-pages/bin/gh-pages.js -u 'CircleCI <circleci@codewithrockstar.com>' -r git@github.com:RockstarLang/codewithrockstar.com.git --add --src docs/js/satriani.js -m 'Updated js/satriani.js from main repo' -b master -d deploy
